title: ummm
content:
I need the Dark Basic cd to make it,[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

yes cd -DRIVE-

really?! youd send me one :dope keen

title: Re: ummm
content: No, he was being sarcastic. You can buy a CD drive at a computer store for about $10, so it shouldn't be to difficult to get one.

title: hey,
content:
I know he was don't you see the dope keen?
(In words, must have typed it wrong.....)

title: Re:  hey,
content: I didn't see the mistyped :dope keen, mainly because I don't read posts slowly and so skip over anything irrelevant. Now I look rather stupid. Oops. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-embarrassed.gif[/img]
